name: Bowling For Monsters
description: This is a game about friendship, and bowling. But mostly friendship. But here at Mon Mon lanes there is a different kind of friend. A friend that helps you score a perfect game at bowling. So strap in, have fun, and do the best bowling of your life."Note: There is a soft-lock on one Monster (Karlson, the orange guy with the big eye). Each run is randomized and if you play again, you might not hit him! We are so bummed that bug is in the jam build, but jams be jams!"
